Package com.ondelette.servlet.webannonces

Interface Summary
ParameterNames Constant strings
 

Class Summary
Annonce Object modelling an "annonce" (classified ad in French)
AnnoncesFolder A group of "annonce" (classified ads)
AnnoncesFolderFactory A factory for AnnoncesFolder
AnnoncesLocale Handles the printout (i18n support should go here)
AnnoncesLocaleFactory A factory for AnnoncesLocale
WebAnnoncesServlet The main servlet serving classified ads
